headline: Lightning Round: ServiceNow's fundamentals are very good, says Jim Cramer
summary: 'Mad Money' host Jim Cramer weighs in on stocks including: ServiceNow, CarMax, Conagra Brands, and Lam Research.

headline: Cramer's Lightning Round: 'I would not own' CarMax
summary: "Mad Money" host Jim Cramer rings the lightning round bell, which means he's giving his answers to callers' stock questions at rapid speed.

headline: Tonkean Hires Aaron Bromagem As GM of LegalWorks
summary: PALO ALTO, Calif., November 13, 2025--Tonkean, the first-of-its-kind process and agentic orchestration platform, today announced that it has hired Aaron Bromagem, former Head of Legal Operations at Snowflake (and previously at ServiceNow), as the General Manager of LegalWorks.
